effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Protects the target’s stats from being lowered for the next five turns.  Increases happiness by 1/1/0.
effect_entries.short_effect: Prevents stat changes in battle for five turns in battle.  Raises happiness.

flavor_text_entries.text: An item that prevents stat reduction among the Trainer’s party Pokémon for five turns after it is used in battle.
